casebody.data:
ELLIS FOSTER COMPANY, Appellee, v. ALDUR CORPORATION, Appellant. No. 184. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 6, 1933. O’Neal, Sealy & Sawyer, of New York City (Arthur T. Sawyer, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Gifford, Scull & Burgess, of New York City (George F. Scull, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (2 F. Supp. 656) affirmed.
